document_data.name: Red Tiger
document_data.mainbody: The '''red tiger''', also known as a '''snow cat''' was a variety of wild feline commonly found throughout [[the North]]. They were particularly hardy, especially when compared to [[tiger]]s from other lands.
document_data.Description: Over the course of the year, a red tiger's coat changed from a tawny hue in the fall months, to a mottled white-red in winter, and again to a deep brown in the summer.
document_data.Combat: When attacking their prey, a red tiger pounced, got a hold of it with its mouth, then raked it with its claws.
